column4: i have a laptop (dell vostro) with ubuntu 8.04.1 on and it is having problems with the wired network, when i boot it, it has bout 25% chance of actually getting an IP, subsequent dhclient commands etc do not help, i always have to reboot until he get's an IP
a friend of mine at work has the exact same problem
anyone know what this could be?
i had a similar problem. someone had connected two routers to the same network.
